body:
**User Story**: As a user I want the platform to be fast and responsive so that I have a great experience

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] Page load time < 2 seconds
- [ ] Time to Interactive < 3 seconds
- [ ] Lighthouse score > 90
- [ ] Database queries optimized (no N+1)
- [ ] Proper caching implemented
- [ ] CDN configured for assets
- [ ] Image optimization pipeline
- [ ] WebSocket connection pooling
- [ ] Mobile performance optimized

**Performance Targets:**

### Frontend Performance:
- [ ] Bundle size < 200KB gzipped
- [ ] Lazy loading for images
- [ ] Code splitting implemented
- [ ] Turbo cache configured
- [ ] Stimulus controllers optimized
- [ ] CSS purged of unused styles
- [ ] Web fonts optimized
- [ ] Service worker for offline

### Backend Performance:
- [ ] Database indexes optimized
- [ ] Query performance < 50ms
- [ ] API response time < 200ms
- [ ] Background job queuing
- [ ] Connection pooling configured
- [ ] Memory usage optimized
- [ ] Sidekiq concurrency tuned

### Database Optimizations:
```ruby
# Add missing indexes
add_index :access_passes, [:user_id, :status]
add_index :streams, [:experience_id, :status]
add_index :spaces, :slug
add_index :experiences, [:space_id, :experience_type]

# Eager loading to prevent N+1
Space.includes(:experiences, :access_passes)
Stream.includes(experience: :space)

# Counter caches
add_column :spaces, :experiences_count, :integer, default: 0
add_column :experiences, :streams_count, :integer, default: 0
```

### Caching Strategy:
- [ ] Fragment caching for views
- [ ] Russian doll caching for nested resources
- [ ] API response caching
- [ ] Redis caching for sessions
- [ ] CDN caching for assets
- [ ] Edge caching with Cloudflare

### Real-time Performance:
- [ ] LiveKit connection optimization
- [ ] GetStream.io connection pooling
- [ ] WebSocket message batching
- [ ] Presence updates throttled
- [ ] Chat pagination implemented

### Mobile Optimizations:
- [ ] Adaptive bitrate for video
- [ ] Image srcset for responsive images
- [ ] Touch gesture optimization
- [ ] Reduced motion support
- [ ] Battery usage optimization

### Monitoring & Metrics:
- [ ] APM tool configured (New Relic/Scout)
- [ ] Custom performance metrics
- [ ] Real User Monitoring (RUM)
- [ ] Database query analysis
- [ ] Memory profiling
- [ ] Load testing completed

### Load Testing Scenarios:
1. 1000 concurrent viewers on single stream
2. 100 simultaneous stream hosts
3. 10,000 chat messages per minute
4. 500 purchases per minute
5. Mobile app with poor network

### Tools to Use:
- Bullet gem for N+1 detection
- rack-mini-profiler for development
- derailed_benchmarks for memory analysis
- Apache Bench for load testing
- Lighthouse CI for frontend metrics

### Specific Optimizations:
- [ ] Optimize Space#show query (currently 15+ queries)
- [ ] Implement GraphQL for mobile API
- [ ] Add pagination to all index pages
- [ ] Implement infinite scroll for chat
- [ ] Optimize image uploads with ActiveStorage
- [ ] Configure Sidekiq for optimal throughput
- [ ] Implement database connection pooling
- [ ] Add Redis cache warming
